etymology.description: 圥(圥) (lù, "earth structure") + 丮(丮) (jǐ, "to hold") = kneeling person planting a sapling into soil -> skill
etymology.interpretation: 埶(yì, "skill") combines the image of planting, symbolizing cultivation and development. The character evolved from depicting the action of planting, reflecting the idea of nurturing and acquiring skill over time.

examples.chinese: 他练就了非凡埶(他練就了非凡埶)。
examples.pinyin: Tā liàn jiù le fēifán yì.

examples.chinese: 她在绘画上展现出精湛的埶(她在繪畫上展現出精湛的埶)，令观众啧啧称奇(令觀眾啧啧稱奇)。
examples.pinyin: Tā zài huìhuà shàng zhǎnxiàn chū jīngzhàn de yì, lìng guānzhòng zézé chēngqí.
examples.english: She displays exquisite skill in painting, amazing the audience.
